Today's Workout

I learn by building things. I do a lot at work but I have my own things that I make on my free time.

Project Info

I created this as a way to keep my workouts fresh and unpredictable when I go to the gym or the park. It just generates random general activities. It will also generate random weight and cardio activities when cardio and/or weights comes up in the general activities view.
